title: Topic 001 Question 452
body: A company is using Amazon Macie, AWS Firewall Manager, Amazon Inspector, and AWS Shield Advanced in its AWS account. The company wants to receive alerts if a DDoS attack occurs against the account.
Which solution will meet this requirement?
options: Use Macie to detect an active DDoS event. Create Amazon CloudWatch alarms that respond to Macie findings.
Use Amazon Inspector to review resources and to invoke Amazon CloudWatch alarms for any resources that are vulnerable to DDoS attacks.
Create an Amazon CloudWatch alarm that monitors Firewall Manager metrics for an active DDoS event.
Create an Amazon CloudWatch alarm that monitors Shield Advanced metrics for an active DDoS event.
